entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Shelburne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mono Centre 2:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: NNE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 1:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 1:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High zero. Forecast issued 1:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
